mapper.sql: iodtlid, invcode, invno, invdate, supplyname, entryname, total_in, susetdtlid, total_line
mapper.select: select f.goodsid, f.invno, f.invcode, to_char(f.invdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') invdate, e.supplyname, g.entryname, e.total_in, f.susetdtlid, f.total_line, f.unitprice, f.goodsqty, h.zx_contractid shtxdh, nvl(i.factflag,2) lplx, j.outersysgoodsid, to_char(l.proddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') proddate, to_char(l.invaliddate,'YYYY-MM-DD') invaliddate, l.lotno from bms_su_set_doc e, bms_su_set_dtl f, pub_entry g, bms_su_dtl h, pub_company i, zx_outersys_goods_mapping j, bms_su_dtl k, bms_lot_def l where f.susetdocid = e.susetdocid(+) and e.supplyid=i.companyid(+) and e.entryid = g.entryid and f.sudocdtlid = h.sudocdtlid(+) and e.entryid=j.entryid and f.goodsid=j.goodsid(+) and f.sudocdtlid=k.sudocdtlid(+) and k.lotid=l.lotid and f.invno=#{invno} and f.invcode=#{invcode}
